author: kingpanther13
releaseNotes:
v0.3.2 - Comprehensive bug fixes (25 bugs fixed):

HIGH:
- Fixed inverted trigger guards in time/sunrise/sunset handlers that could fire rules without matching trigger
- Fixed evt not forwarded to nested actions in if_then_else and repeat blocks
- Added missing findDevice() validation for set_level, set_color, set_color_temperature, lock, unlock, activate_scene

MEDIUM:
- Added substituteVariables() to log, speak, set_variable, and set_local_variable actions
- Fixed thermostat setpoint validation to support both Fahrenheit (40-100) and Celsius (4-38)
- Added unschedule() to enableRule() to prevent duplicate scheduled triggers
- Added validation for set_hsm status and set_mode mode names
- Added value requirement for device_state and variable conditions when operator specified
- Fixed JSON-RPC protocol: empty batch error, missing method error code, parse error handling
- Added equals/not_equals operators for illuminance/power in if_then_else UI
- Wired clearAllSubPageSettings() to main page to clean up orphaned form state

LOW:
- Fixed duration trigger key collision for multi-device triggers
- Fixed hardcoded health endpoint version (now uses currentVersion())
- Added variable_math to UI (renderActionFields, buildActionFromSettings, loadActionSettings)
- Fixed falsy value loss (0, empty string) in UI load functions
- Changed HTTP 202 to 204 for JSON-RPC notifications
- Made periodic trigger UI range unit-aware
- Converted ~150 updateSetting() calls to typed format
- Added default case to executeAction() for unknown action types
